updateProduct: UPDATE [dbo].[sanpham] SET maso = @maso,ten = @ten, nhasanxuat = @nhasanxuat,hinhanh = @hinhanh,mota = @mota,thongso = @thongso,giabanhienhanh = @giabanhienhanh,idnhomsanpham = @idnhomsanpham  WHERE id = @id
addNewCart: insert into giohang (idtaikhoan, tongtien) values (@idtaikhoan,0) select distinct(giohang.id) from giohang where giohang.idtaikhoan = @idtaikhoan
getCartById: select distinct(giohang.id) from giohang where giohang.idtaikhoan = @idtaikhoan
checkUserValid: SELECT * FROM [dbo].[taikhoan] WHERE tendangnhap=@tendangnhap AND matkhau=@matkhau
checkCart: select count(*) as count from giohang where giohang.idtaikhoan = @idtaikhoan
deleteProductFromCart: DELETE FROM chitietgiohang WHERE idsanpham = @idsanpham and idgiohang = @idgiohang
getShoppingCartById: begin select sp.* from chitietgiohang as ctgh, taikhoan as tk, giohang as gh, sanpham as sp where tk.id = @idtaikhoan and gh.idtaikhoan = tk.id and gh.id = ctgh.idgiohang and ctgh.idsanpham = sp.id end
getShoppingCartId: select giohang.* from giohang where giohang.idtaikhoan = @idtaikhoan
